Name: UniverseSchemeName
Description: A name for the UniverseScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the UniverseScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the UniverseScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: UniverseSchemeReference
Description: Allows the inclusion of a UniverseScheme by reference.

Name: UniverseReference
Description: Describes a universe (population, object). A universe may be organized into hierarchical sub-universe classes.

Name: UniverseGroupReference
Description: Describes a group of universes (populations, objects) for administrative purposes.
